2024.context: Paylocity Holding Corporation is a cloud HCM software company focused on payroll, HR, benefits, and workforce management for mid-market. AI-powered HR features. Employee experience focus.

competitors.name: ADP RUN
competitors.notes: Best for small businesses, built on ADP's payroll heritage

competitors.name: Rippling
competitors.notes: Best for global workforce management, robust HCM with advanced automation and analytics for any size business, consolidates HR/IT/finance

competitors.name: BambooHR
competitors.notes: Best for customer support and satisfaction, HR-focused platform

competitors.name: Workday HCM
competitors.notes: Best for analytics and reporting, enterprise-grade HCM solution

competitors.name: Paycom
competitors.notes: Best for employee self-service, closed ecosystem with all modules built internally, most often evaluated against Paylocity

competitors.name: Paycor
competitors.notes: Leading alternative based on crowdsourced data from 1,000+ HR software selection projects

competitors.name: Netchex
competitors.notes: Leading industry alternative for mid-market HR management

competitors.name: Justworks
competitors.notes: Leading alternative focused on simplifying HR for small businesses

competitors.name: Deel
competitors.notes: Focuses on global teams, supports payroll in 100+ countries, handles global payments, tax reporting, and visa sponsorship

competitors.name: Remote
competitors.notes: Global HR platform for payroll, international employment, contractor management, launched Remote Global Payroll in 2023

competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Founded 1971, decades of payroll and tax compliance expertise, Paychex Flex for smaller employers

2025.context: Paylocity Holding Corporation is a cloud HCM software company focused on payroll, HR, benefits, and workforce management for mid-market. Mid-market HCM leader. Competing with Paycom, Paychex.

competitors.name: Paycom

competitors.name: Workday

competitors.name: isolved
competitors.notes: HCM platform for SMB market with payroll and HR solutions
